summary:
Description & Info :
Located just west from Whiterun , Dolphyn Estate is a medium-sized but
cozy & practical player settlement :
-Dolphyn Manor (Basement-Living Area-Kitchen-Bedroom-Office-Mage-Attic)
-Exterior (courtyard-stables-guestroom above stables)
descriptionHtml:
Dolphyn Estate v2.0
(by Remcoz ©2014)
A player-home mod for The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim

Hihoo everyone :-)

First of all , thanks for stopping by to have a look at this modest creation .
This is the 1st mod (2nd version though) I release , so I hope you'll be tolerant ;-)
Initially started in Oblivion , Dolphyn Estate was meant to be (and still is!)
my personal home , arranged to fit my gameplay (geographical preferences , esthetics ,
practical storage etc...)
When Skyrim came out , I kinda let Oblivion aside , but wanted to bring
Dolphyn Estate into it .
After numerous hours of hard work ... Here is what suits me (well , allmost 99% ^^)
Wasn't sure if I'd release it , and thought :
"What the heck , after all ...It's always instructive to get feedback on a creation , no ?
And maybe some of you will like & use it :-) !"

It's not a "Cheater-House" , so don't expect to find any
objects/items/treasure in there (except a couple of hanging ingredients) :-)
I didn't "over-decorate" it either , (I kinda like "sobriety")
so up to you to fill it with your personal style .
But I like to have my storage confortable & well-organized , so I created for
nearly each container unique Forms and/or ID's , named to match each "zone"
(Bedroom dresser ... Basement barrel ... Magic weapon chest ...Office safe ...and so on !...)
All of them are empty and never respawn .

Last little thing ...
I'm a "sunday-modder" and very busy in real-life , so I'm not planning to
make regular updates/evolutions for the time being .

For info , the screenshots are Vanilla , with only official DLC's (including Hires texture DLC) .
Only thing added is Post Process Injector 2.1 with some settings that suit me :-)

So ... you'll find :
- All the crafting equipment you may need in the basement .
- Magic crafting tables in the attic .
- Cooking equipment in the kitchen .
- Plenty of "logical & zone-renamed" storage/containers .
- Sober but subtle decoration .
- Cozy atmosphere in a nice environment .
- Stable for you horse

Also ...:
- Geographically well-settled
- Once discovered , it will have a map-marker & can be fast-traveled to .
- All ownerships (furniture,containers,doors,crafting equipment & bookshelves) are set to Player .

What you will NOT find :
- Mannequins & Display cases
- Patrol path for companions
- Bookshelves (This saddens me , but having recurrent unsolved issues with bookshelves , I decided to let it aside )
(for the story , when I create a good working (tested ingame) 10-bookshelf , if I duplicate it 1à3 times , I have 3x10-books that work well . But if I duplicate one of them a 4th time , that one will work well , but each of the others suddenly show up a capacity 11 , or 13 , or 16 books . Posted a couple of times about it on Nexus in the last 2 years without much reactions solutions .... so I gave up on this :-( )

Requirements :
-Skyrim.esm
-Update.esm

Installation :
Simply drop "Dolphyn_Estate.esp" into your Data folder and
check in Skyrim-launcher/data files that it is ticked .

In case you use the outdated Dolphyn Manor v1 , just overwrite it (it's the same filename for v1 & v2)
Just remember to empty all your containers from V1 and save your game , before replacing
the ESP & re-dispatching your goods in v2...)

Uninstallation :
Simply remove/delete "Dolphyn_Estate.esp" from your Data folder .

Bugs and (in)compatibility :
None (as far I know) .
But any other mod affecting that same exterior
area/cell MAY cause unexpected weirdnesses !!!

This mod may not be modified without my permission .
I don't mean to be rude here , but a little email or private message
(explaining what you wanna do) doesn't cost much , no ?
And I'm not totally "hermetical" ^^
Thanks .
This being said , I thank you for reading :-)
Enjoy your stay @ Dolphyn Estate ;-)

Remcoz

Contact :
Send me a private message @ my nexus-forum-profile :
http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/798374-remcoz/

©Remcoz 2014 . This may not be modified without Remcoz's permission .
